main event: On 15 March 1960, a round object was observed in Nome, Alaska, appearing bluish-white and exploding into two pieces.
interesting points: The object traveled in a straight path from southeast to northwest,The witness observed the object's bright blue flash as it exploded,The observation lasted approximately 20 seconds,The object was determined to be unidentified after the investigation,There was no photograph included in the report despite initial mention of 'photos: yes.'
